versions.changes_summary: Initial Privacy Policy - Covers data collection, location usage for weather features, photo processing for wake-up challenges, Firebase Analytics integration, RevenueCat subscription management, optional cloud backup to iCloud/Google Drive, and GDPR/CCPA compliance

Initial Terms of Service - Covers subscription terms (monthly/yearly plans with free trial), auto-renewal policy, refund policy via Apple/Google, alarm reliability disclaimers, limitation of liability, acceptable use restrictions, and governing law (Oman)
